name: Zjedz Trawkę 2
description:
Very bad hamsters from the Pruszkowski's Hamsters evil band stole tasty grass from a guinea pig and hid it in a maze.  Who's going to eat the grass first - a guinea pig or an evil hamster?

Two-person local multiplayer rhythm game with audio beat and three steps ahead. Enjoy!

Team:
- Mikołaj Kurcin (programming)
- Agata Nawrot (art)
- Sebastian Krzyszkowiak (music and engine)
